ftMarket.title: Bank of Japan decision in March 2026?
ftMarket.question: Bank of Japan decision in March 2026?
ftMarket.description:
### Resolution Criteria
This market will resolve to the amount of basis points the upper bound of the short-term policy interest rate is changed by versus the level it was prior to the Bank of Japan's **March 2026** meeting.

If the short-term policy interest rate is changed to a level not expressed in the displayed options, the change will be rounded up to the nearest 25 and will resolve to the relevant bracket (e.g. if there's a cut/increase of 12.5 bps it will be considered to be 25 bps).

This market may resolve as soon as the Bank of Japan's statement for their **March** meeting with relevant data is issued. If no statement is released by the end date of this meeting, this market will resolve to the "No Change" bracket.

### Resolution Source
The resolution source for this market is the Bank of Japan's statement after its meeting scheduled for **March 18 - 19, 2026** according to the [official calendar](https://www.boj.or.jp/en/mopo/mpmsche_minu/index.htm).

The level and change of the target short-term policy interest rate is also published at the [official website of the Bank of Japan](https://www.boj.or.jp/en/mopo/mpmdeci/state_2025/index.htm).


## Additional Information
*This market will end before the Bank of Japan meeting begins, and it will resolve within 24 hours of the statement release.*
